p: "Infodemic" stems from two words, "information" and "epidemic", and refers to a rapid and far-reaching spread of both accurate and inaccurate information about a disease. During a pandemic, when facts are often mixed with rumors, it becomes difficult to learn essential information about an issue. Infodemics, like epidemics, can be managed.
